description.@en: Some Ogres in northern regions have grown protective layers of blubber fat and thick white hair grows in large tufts all over their bodies. These Ogres are often called Wendigo and they are isolationist and even a little xenophobic. However, none are better at navigating cold steppes and tundra.

effect.@en: You are immune from the effects of Frostbite, and automatically succeed at Toughness Tests to withstand cold weather.
